name: Jafar Ahmed-Khan
story: Abdul-Latif Amin grew up in a small village in Iran. He always had a passion for helping others and knew that he wanted to pursue a career in medicine. After completing his training as a Combat Life Saver, he joined the military in hopes of serving his country and making a difference. Abdul-Latif is determined to use his skills and knowledge to save as many lives as possible, even in the most dangerous situations.
